Shopping Cart page

Note: You must be logged into Figma to see the designs. Also you must be eligible for this design file. If you see an input field "Password required. You need a password to access the file New order journey", please ask Theresa Kuschke to invite you to the file "New order journey".
Topics to be prioritized for the basic MVP
In scope: The shopping cart contains only one package.
Later: The shopping cart contains multiple packages.
In scope: The package has a quantity of 1. Only one contract with one phone number is created with the new order.
Later: The package has a quantity up to of 100.
Later: There is no package with a main contract and subcontracts ("Teamkarten").
In scope: The contract can have MultiSIMs.
Later: There will be packages with devices.
Out of scope: Customers are not listed in the Phone Directory.
In scope: Enter the customer password
Later: Enter the start date (default: as soon as possible)
Later: Select contract barriers
In scope: Display the contract duration (default: 24 months)
In scope: Select SIM type for main SIM per contract
In scope: Select SIM type for the MultiSIMs per contract and per MultiSIM
In scope: Mobile number portability: Enter the source provider, etc. per package, enter the phone number per contract
Later: Blank SIM cards
Later: Reserved phone numbers
In scope: Enter cost center and cost center user per contract
In scope: Select the billing account (read list of billing accounts for customer number and RV). Show data of the selected billing account.
Later: Create a new billing account
In scope: Choose the customer's address as the shipping address. Show the customer's address
Later: Enter a new shipping address, per package or per contract
In scope: Summary page with the content of the shopping cart and checkboxes for terms and conditions
Later: Integrate order document and VVI/VZF into Summary page
In scope: Map the shopping cart to MB2B
